_description: Patterns extracted from user feedback. These are incorporated into prompts to improve future redlining.

patterns.rule: Do not add knowledge qualifiers to representations about Seller's own organizational status, authority, or capacity to execute
Preserve standard notice provisions unless the notice periods are unreasonably short
examples: Any notice shall be deemed given when delivered
Notice shall be sent to the following addresses

patterns.rule: When extending deadlines, change only the time period, not the surrounding sentence structure
examples: within three (3) days → within five (5) business days
for a period of one (1) year → for a period of nine (9) months

knowledge_qualifiers.description: Rules about when to add or not add knowledge qualifiers

preservation.description: Rules about what language to preserve unchanged

surgical_editing.description: Rules about making minimal, targeted changes

update_frequency: After each redlining session with corrections
